NK036(chi)018:0: gcud phur gsum gyi rgyab yig gnad bsdus sgron me bi mas mdzad pa bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)018:1: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK036(chi)018:2: thod rgal gyi bogs 'don rgya mtsho ar gtad kyi mun khrid la gsum /
NK036(chi)018:4: dngos gzhi nyams su blangs pa dang /
NK036(chi)018:5: rjes su nyams dang rtags kyi rim pa'o //
NK036(chi)018:6: dang po ni byams pa dang snying rje byang chub kyi sems bsgom man+dala 'bul /
NK036(chi)018:7: bla ma la gsol ba drag po gdab bo //
NK036(chi)018:8: dngos gzhi gnas khang mun pa nag por stan bde
NK036(chi)018:9: bar sprul sku'i bzhugs stangs byas te rgya mtsho ar
NK036(chi)018:11: dngos su gzhug pa gnyis so //
NK036(chi)018:12: dang po ni gru mo gnyis pus mo'i steng du bzhag la /
NK036(chi)018:13: lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi mtheb mdzub gsum la /
NK036(chi)018:15: mig gi 'bras bu gnyis chir mnan pas /
NK036(chi)018:16: dang po ye shes kyi rang mdangs 'od dang thig le tsem tsem pa 'byung ba dang /
NK036(chi)018:17: lag pa gnyis kyis btang ba dang /
NK036(chi)018:18: mig 'bras gnyis ma 'gul bar bltas pas /
NK036(chi)018:19: nang gi rigs lnga zhi khro ye shes lnga'i rang mdangs rnams yul du gsal /
NK036(chi)018:20: gzung yul du ma grub pa'i zag med thig le /
NK036(chi)018:21: bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi langs pa mngon sum du gsal lo //
NK036(chi)018:22: ye shes kyi 'dug tshul de gsal nas 'dug kyang chos sku'i ngang /
NK036(chi)018:23: stong nas 'dug kyang chos sku'i ngang //
NK036(chi)018:24: stong gsal gnyis med chos sku'i ngang //
NK036(chi)018:25: chos sku'i ngang nas 'da' mi srid //
NK036(chi)018:26: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
NK036(chi)018:27: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
NK036(chi)018:28: yang dag don la gnyis med gcig ma grub //
NK036(chi)018:29: sku dang ye shes kyi 'dug tshul de //
NK036(chi)018:30: ngo bo ka dag brjod pa'i tshig dang bral //
NK036(chi)018:31: rang bzhin lhun grub rgya chad phyogs lhung bral //
NK036(chi)018:32: rig pa ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ni phyogs ris med pa'i rig mdangs phyi ru rang gsal /
NK036(chi)018:33: rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma la /
NK036(chi)018:34: thig le stong pa'i sgron ma /
NK036(chi)018:35: dper na rma bya'i mdongs bzhin /
NK036(chi)018:36: ye shes zang thal chen po shar ro //
NK036(chi)018:37: yul gang la shar ba la gsum /
NK036(chi)018:38: dbang po 'khrul snang gi yul dang /
NK036(chi)018:39: sgron ma ye shes rang mdangs kyi yul dang /
NK036(chi)018:40: yang dag chos nyid ka dag gi yul lo //
NK036(chi)018:42: mig gi yul du gzugs sna tshogs rang kha mar mthong ba la bya ste /
NK036(chi)018:45: phyi 'dod yon la spyod pas na yul lo //
NK036(chi)018:46: gnyis pa ni 'od thig le dang /
NK036(chi)018:47: sku dang ye shes sna tshogs rang kha mar mthong ba la bya ste /
NK036(chi)018:48: sku dang ye shes kyi tshogs su khra cem gyis stong gsum du gsal lo //
NK036(chi)018:49: gsang ba chos nyid ka dag gi yul ni /
NK036(chi)018:50: chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa /
NK036(chi)018:55: sgra dang tshad ma gtan tshigs gang gis kyang gtan la ma phebs pa /
NK036(chi)018:56: mdor na rig pa ka dag gi ye shes nyid yin te /
NK036(chi)018:57: sku dang ye shes la sogs pa'i 'byung gnas chen po yin no //
NK036(chi)018:58: thig le stong pa'i sgron ma de la brten nas
NK036(chi)018:59: don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i don nges par
NK036(chi)018:62: dbang po'i yul la 'char bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rtsal 'char /
NK036(chi)018:63: thog ma 'od kyi thig le ni /
NK036(chi)018:66: 'od lnga'i mtshan nyid du gsal ba /
NK036(chi)018:67: 'od lnga ye shes lnga'i ngo bor snang ba /
NK036(chi)018:70: 'dod pa med par shar ba ni nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba /
NK036(chi)018:71: yon tan btsal mi dgos par /
NK036(chi)018:72: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK036(chi)018:73: skyon spang mi dgos par rang dag sgron ma'i nyams
NK036(chi)018:74: de'ang nyon mongs pa spang mi dgos par rang dag
NK036(chi)018:75: ste / gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
NK036(chi)018:76: ngo bor ka dag la longs spyod pa'i gnad yin
NK036(chi)018:77: pas nyams rtogs yon tan 'dod pa med par 'byung
NK036(chi)018:78: ba ni / nam mkha'i cho 'phrul lta bur bkag pas mi khegs par 'byung ngo //
NK036(chi)018:79: de ltar ngo mun nag tu sprad pas /
NK036(chi)018:80: gsal stong longs sku'i zhing khams su rgyas /
NK036(chi)018:81: de ltar nyin mtshan du nyams su blangs pas /
NK036(chi)018:82: sku rnam pa lnga rang rdzogs su snang /
NK036(chi)018:83: ye shes lnga rang dag tu gsal /
NK036(chi)018:84: ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum /
NK036(chi)018:85: dbyer med phyed pas tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas /
NK036(chi)018:86: de yang thad la drang por lta zhing mtheb mdzub
NK036(chi)018:87: gnyis pos sgron ma'i steng 'og gnyis g.yas g.yon gnyis
NK036(chi)018:88: / yang na steng nas gtims pas /
NK036(chi)018:89: rjes la ma yengs par bltas pas /
NK036(chi)018:90: rnal 'byor bdag gzhan rig pa'i ye shes de nyid
NK036(chi)018:91: nyams su myong ba dpag par dka' ba don sku
NK036(chi)018:92: dang ye shes kyi dgongs pa /
NK036(chi)018:93: rab tu 'di nyid la 'grub par the tshom med do //
NK036(chi)018:94: thun bzhi'am drug tu nyams su blang ngo //
NK036(chi)018:95: 'di ni rgya mtsho ar la gtad pa'i man ngag go //
NK036(chi)018:99: chos nyid don gyi rgya mtsho bar bshad do //
NK036(chi)018:100: gnyis pa rgya mtsho dwangs su gzhug pa ni /
NK036(chi)018:101: stan bde ba la rdo rje skyil krung bya //
NK036(chi)018:103: sked pa drang pas rtsa drang /
NK036(chi)018:105: rlung drang bas thig le drang /
NK036(chi)018:106: thig le drang bas ye shes zang thal du 'char ro //
NK036(chi)018:107: mig gis lta stangs gsum gang mos gcig la bltas pas /
NK036(chi)018:108: snang ba chos sku'i zhing khams su rgyas par 'char ro //
NK036(chi)018:109: ye shes kyi chos lnga ni /
NK036(chi)018:112: kun gzhi las 'das pa'i chos sku /
NK036(chi)018:115: tshig las 'das pa'i rang snang ngo //
NK036(chi)018:116: zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra //
NK036(chi)018:117: lhag mthong ma rmongs mkha' la gza' skar bkram //
NK036(chi)018:118: bde gsal mi rtog mkha' la nyi ltar gsal //
NK036(chi)018:119: zung 'jug gnyis med nyi ma 'od kyi tshul //
NK036(chi)018:120: rang rig ye shes zang thal shar ba de //
NK036(chi)018:121: nam mkha'i khams su phyin yang g.yang za ba dang ltung ba'i sdug bsngal rig pa nga la med /
NK036(chi)018:122: ri rab kyi rtse la phyin yang nyam nga ba dang bying ba med /
NK036(chi)018:123: rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin yang gsher ba dang sub pa med /
NK036(chi)018:124: me dpung gi nang du phyin yang tsha ba dang tshig pa med /
NK036(chi)018:125: rig pa lhun grub dngos sam skye shi'i skyon gyis ma gos /
NK036(chi)018:126: 'khor ba'i dge sdig gis ma gos /
NK036(chi)018:127: skyon med rang grol chen por shar nas /
NK036(chi)018:128: phyogs ris gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
NK036(chi)018:129: ngo bo chos sku rnam dag spros bral ngang gis
NK036(chi)018:130: stong rang bzhin longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad 'ja'
NK036(chi)018:132: sprul sku sna tshogs 'gro ba thugs rjes 'dul //
NK036(chi)018:133: chos nyid mdangs can ye shes kha dog ni mthing ga dkar ser dmar ljang lnga ru gsal //
NK036(chi)018:134: chos dbyings ye shes nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
NK036(chi)018:135: me long ye shes mi skye ma 'gag gsal //
NK036(chi)018:136: mnyam nyid ye shes dbyer med thams cad mkhyen //
NK036(chi)018:137: so sor kun rtog mi phyed so sor gsal //
NK036(chi)018:138: bya ba grub pas 'bras bu mngon du gyur //
NK036(chi)018:139: sku lnga bstan pas dgongs spyod mkha' la 'gro //
NK036(chi)018:140: mtshan ma spros bral tha snyad tshig las 'das //
NK036(chi)018:141: nyin nub mi 'ong nyin mtshan gnyis su med //
NK036(chi)018:142: 'khor 'das gnyis 'dzin bsam pa skye mi srid //
NK036(chi)018:143: khregs chod lta ba'i rtsi yis zin pa gces //
NK036(chi)018:144: sangs rgyas bstan 'dzin 'jig rten sgron ma'i mchog /
NK036(chi)018:145: mi g.yo rgya mtsho dwangs su 'jug pa'i khrid //
NK036(chi)018:146: nyin mtshan gsum na rtags 'byung the tshom med //
NK036(chi)018:147: rgya mtsho ar gtad kyi mun khrid /
NK036(chi)018:148: chos nyid zad pa'i sa la phyin pa'i rnal 'byor
NK036(chi)018:149: dbang phyug lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug gis mdzad
NK036(chi)018:150: pa rdzogs so // rig pa mngon sum ma sbyangs na //
NK036(chi)018:151: bar do'i ye shes bdud du ldang //
NK036(chi)018:152: rig pa sgyu lus sems 'dzin gyis //
NK036(chi)018:153: rang la rang 'jigs lus ngan len //
NK036(chi)018:154: dgongs spyod mngon du gyur pa na //
NK036(chi)018:156: rig pa'i don ni de bzhin nyid //
NK036(chi)018:157: rtag par nam mkha'i mtha' la lta //
NK036(chi)018:158: chos nyid mkha' la nyi shar 'dra //
NK036(chi)018:159: dgongs pa chu bo gang g+aa'i rgyun //
NK036(chi)018:160: lus med lus de lus kyi mchog /
NK036(chi)018:161: lus kyi mtha' ni chos skur rtogs //
NK036(chi)018:162: bsam med sems spang sems kyi mchog /
NK036(chi)018:163: ngag med smra brjod yul las grol //
NK036(chi)018:164: brjod med stong pa chos kyi sgra //
NK036(chi)018:165: gdul bya rnam dag chos nyid zhing khams na //
NK036(chi)018:166: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gnas pa //
NK036(chi)018:167: ma rig sems can gdul dka' 'dul //
NK036(chi)018:169: 'khor ba'i sems can chos skur grol //
NK036(chi)018:170: yid bzhin rin chen rang sar grol //
